text: Mwesi wa Namasani ni awula wajatulusyidwe Qurâ€™an nkati mwakwe kuwa chongolo cha wandu ni ilosyo ya kuonechela palangulangu ya chongoko, soni kuwa chilekanganyo (cha yakuona ni yaunami), sano jwauweni mwa jaomanja mwesi (ali chitamile pamusi) atawe Namasanijo, nambo jwachawe nkulwala kapena paulendo (nigopola), akwanisye chiwalanjilo ni mowa gane (ga kuuchisya), Allah jukunsoselaga yakwepepala wanganyammwe soni jwangansosela yakunonopa, soni (jukusaka) kuti nkwanisye chiwalanjilocho ni kunkusyaga Allah (pakutenda Takbirah) ligongo lya kun'jongola kwenu soni kuti m'be wakutogolela
